title: Draw Us in the Spirit's Tether

lyrics.text:
As disciples used to gather in the name of Christ to sup, then with thanks to God the Father break the bread and bless the cup,
alleluia, alleluia! So now bind our friendship up.

All our meals and all our living make as sacraments of you, that by caring, helping, giving, we may be disciples true.
Alleluia, alleluia! we will serve with faith anew.

author: Percy Dearmer (1931)
